name: @saekitominaga/customelements-input-isbn
description: ISBN input field by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputIsbn.js -- brotlin compress {{file}} -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputIsbn.js -- terser {{file}} -o {{fileDir}}/{{fileBaseNoExt}}.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='{{fileDir}}/{{fileBaseNoExt}}.js.map',filename='{{fileBaseNoExt}}.js',includeSources,url='{{fileBaseNoExt}}.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputIsbn.min.js -- brotlin compress {{file}} -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputIsbn.d.ts -- cpy {{file}} dist --rename=InputIsbn.min.d.ts
